item.title: 瓦努阿图地震后可能出现危险的海啸波
item.description: 瓦努阿图群岛发生初步震级为 7.4 级的地震，可能引发危险的海啸。【原文：Hazardous tsunami waves are possible after an earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 7.4 struck the Vanuatu Islands.】

item.title: 力拓和必和必拓在建设 "绿色 "炼铁厂方面迈出新步伐
item.description: 世界顶级矿商必和必拓集团（BHP Group）和力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）将联合博思格钢铁有限公司（BlueScope Steel Ltd.）建造澳大利亚最大的电炼铁炉，并称此举可加快钢铁生产的去碳化进程。【原文：The world’s top miners BHP Group and Rio Tinto Group will join BlueScope Steel Ltd. to build Australia’s largest electric iron-making furnace, a move they say may speed the decarbonization of steel production.】

item.title: 气候变化偷走了数周的冬季，令滑雪场业主不安
item.description:
全球零度以下的天数正在减少，这迫使企业主做出调整。【原文：

The number of days below freezing is dwindling across the globe, forcing business owners to adapt. 

】

item.title: 英国警告又有近百万房产面临洪水风险
item.description: 英格兰面临洪水风险的房产比以前想象的多出近一百万处，这引发了人们对未来几十年内越来越多的房产无法投保或无法出售的担忧。【原文：Almost a million more properties in England are at risk of flooding than previously thought, raising concerns about a growing number of uninsurable or unsellable properties over the coming decades.】

item.title: 戒严令风波令韩国核电发展存疑
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈的弹劾案引发了反对派上台并彻底改变国家更广泛能源战略的可能性，韩国对核能的拥护也因此受到质疑。【原文：South Korea’s embrace of nuclear energy has been thrown into doubt as President Yoon Suk Yeol’s impeachment case raises the possibility of the opposition coming to power and overhauling the nation’s broader energy strategy.】

item.title: 拜登的液化天然气研究不会停止新的出口
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，拜登政府对液化天然气出口进行的一项备受期待的研究预计不会说批准更多的液化天然气出口不符合公众利益。【原文：A highly anticipated study of liquefied natural gas exports by the Biden administration is expected to stop short of saying the approval of more shipments isn’t in the public interest, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波兰赞成推迟建立新的运输和供暖碳市场
item.description: 波兰气候部副部长克日什托夫-博莱斯塔（Krzysztof Bolesta）表示，欧盟应考虑推迟新的运输和取暖燃料碳市场，以便让消费者有更多机会投资清洁能源。【原文：The European Union should consider postponing its new carbon market for transport and heating fuels to give consumers more opportunity to invest in clean energy sources, according to Poland’s deputy climate minister, Krzysztof Bolesta.】

item.title: 加州让保险公司为气候风险定价引发成本担忧
item.description: 在野火风险不断增加的情况下，几家主要保险公司退出了市场，加州通过了一项旨在促进该州房屋保险的规则。【原文：California adopted a rule that aims to bolster access to home insurance in the state, after several major carriers retreated from the market amid growing risk of wildfires.】

item.title: 中国上海和杭州警告未来将出现严重空气污染
item.description: 中国的金融和商业中心上海和附近的杭州市都发布了空气重污染警报，并建议儿童、老人和病人避免长时间户外活动。【原文：China’s financial and business hub of Shanghai and the nearby city of Hangzhou both issued alerts for heavy air pollution and advised children, the elderly and sick people to avoid prolonged outdoor activities.】

item.title: 人们真正想要的二手礼品
item.description: 想在这个节日寻找独特又实惠的礼物吗？今天的时事通讯将关注那些越来越乐于购买和接受二手礼物的购物者。这是一种对地球有益的趋势。您可以在 Bloomberg.com 上阅读和分享本篇报道的完整版。如需无限制地获取气候和能源新闻，请订阅。【原文：Looking for something unique and affordable this holiday season? item.title: 旨在去除电动汽车电池中永久性化学物质的初创公司
item.description:
总部位于香港的 GRST 开发出一种水溶性结合复合材料，可在电池制造过程中消除 PFAS 的使用，并使回收变得更加容易。【原文：

Hong Kong-based GRST has developed a water-soluble binding composite that eliminates PFAS use in battery manufacturing and makes recycling much easier.

】

item.title: 斯塔默访问英国，英国和挪威期待达成碳管道协议
item.description: 英国和挪威将宣布建立绿色能源工业伙伴关系的计划，包括未来在海底运输碳的安排。【原文：Britain and Norway are set to announce plans for an industrial partnership for green energy including a future arrangement to transport of carbon under the sea.】

item.title: 中国逆变器制造商计划斥资 1.5 亿美元在马来西亚建立太阳能基地
item.description: 中国逆变器生产商宁波德业科技股份有限公司计划投资 1.5 亿美元，在马来西亚建设太阳能设备生产基地。【原文：Ningbo Deye Technology Co., a Chinese inverter producer, plans to invest up to $150 million in building a solar equipment manufacturing base in Malaysia.】

item.title: 英国风电产量创纪录，对法国出口激增
item.description: 周日，英国风力发电量创下历史新高，对法国的出口也达到一年多来的最高水平。【原文：UK wind power output reached a record on Sunday, sending exports to France to their highest level in more than a year.】

item.title: 法国马约特岛遭受飓风袭击，近千人恐将丧生
item.description: 周六，热带气旋 "千岛 "袭击了莫桑比克沿海的马约特岛，法国领土马约特岛的当地官员担心多达 1,000 人死亡。【原文：Local officials in the French territory Mayotte fear as many as 1,000 people have died after Tropical Cyclone Chido hit the island off the coast of Mozambique on Saturday.】

item.title: StanChart 是准备向象牙海岸提供 8 亿美元贷款的银行之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，象牙海岸正在向包括渣打银行在内的银行寻求约 8 亿美元的贷款，以便为即将到期的债务进行再融资。【原文：Ivory Coast is turning to banks including Standard Chartered Plc for a loan of about $800 million to refinance upcoming maturities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新西兰提高近海火山航空警报代码
item.description: 新西兰官员已经提高了近海火山瓦卡里/白岛的航空警报代码，该火山正在喷发大量蒸汽和气体，并不时喷出火山灰。【原文：New Zealand officials have raised the aviation alert code for the offshore volcano Whakaari/White Island, which is emitting large steam and gas plumes and occasionally ash.】

item.title: 伊朗全力应对冬季寒流带来的燃料短缺问题
item.description: 寒流迫使伊朗大部分地区的学校停课，公共生活也受到其他干扰，因为当局正在努力解决供暖和发电用天然气短缺的问题。【原文：A cold snap has forced school closures and other disruptions to public life across much of Iran, as authorities grapple with a shortage of natural gas for heating and electricity generation.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称黑海风暴袭击油轮造成一人死亡
item.description: 当局称，一艘俄罗斯油轮在黑海风暴中搁浅，至少一人死亡，另一艘船也受到损坏。【原文：At least one person died after a Russian tanker ran aground in a Black Sea storm, while another ship also sustained damage, authorities said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯在风暴损坏两艘油轮后展开救援行动
item.description: 莫斯科（美联社）— 俄罗斯官员周日告诉国家新闻机构，两艘俄罗斯油轮在刻赤海峡的风暴中严重受损，石油泄漏并引发了紧急救援行动。【原文：MOSCOW (AP) — Two Russian oil tankers have taken heavy damage amid a storm in the Kerch Strait, spilling oil and sparking an emergency rescue operation, Russian officials told state news outlets Sunday.】

item.title: 安桥输油管道称威斯康星州漏油清理工作正在进行中
item.description: Enbridge 公司周六表示，11 月 11 日在威斯康星州泄漏的 960 桶石油中的 60% 已被清理，受影响的土壤正在被清除。【原文：Enbridge Inc. said Saturday that 60% of the 960 barrels of oil that were spilled on Nov. 11 in Wisconsin has been cleaned up and any affected soil is being removed.】

item.title: 如何购买别人可能真的想要的二手礼物
item.description:
为了追求独特性和物美价廉，购物者越来越愿意购买和接受二手礼品，而且这样做对地球更有益。【原文：

In search of uniqueness and affordable quality, shoppers are increasingly open to buying and receiving secondhand gifts — and it’s better for the planet.

】

item.title: WEC Energy 为可再生能源项目提供 25 亿美元美国贷款
item.description: 拜登政府正在为 WEC 能源集团公司在威斯康星州的子公司提供多达 25 亿美元的融资，用于建设可再生能源和电池储能项目。【原文：The Biden administration is offering WEC Energy Group Inc.’s Wisconsin subsidiary as much as $2.5 billion in financing for the construction of renewable power and battery storage projects.】

item.title: 加州汽车排放案获美国最高法院复审
item.description: 美国最高法院将审理一起因加利福尼亚州车辆污染限制引发的冲突，并同意裁决生产或销售生物燃料的公司是否有合法权利就该法规提起诉讼。【原文：The US Supreme Court will hear a clash stemming from California’s vehicle pollution limits, agreeing to decide whether companies that produce or sell biofuels have a legal right to sue over the regulations.】

item.title: 众议院小组称发现 "气候卡特尔 "勾结的证据
item.description: 众议院司法委员会称，它发现了 "大量证据表明 "金融业存在 "串通和反竞争行为"，对美国公司 "强加激进的环境、社会和公司治理目标"。【原文：The House Judiciary Committee said it’s found “substantial evidence of collusion and anticompetitive behavior” by the financial industry to “impose radical ESG-goals” on US companies.】

item.title: 快速移动的暴风雪将在北加州降下 70 英寸的积雪
item.description: 本周末，一场快速移动的风暴将席卷加利福尼亚州北部和西北太平洋地区，给该地区带来大风、暴雪和洪水。【原文：A fast-moving storm will sweep into northern California and the Pacific Northwest this weekend, bringing high winds, heavy snow and flooding rain to the region.】

item.title: 强烈气旋 "奇多 "瞄准莫桑比克北海岸
item.description: 法国气象局称，热带气旋 "琪朵 "在向印度洋马约特岛袭来的途中加剧了风力，风速高达每小时 260 公里（160 英里）。【原文：Tropical Cyclone Chido intensified as it barreled toward the Indian Ocean island of Mayotte on its way toward Mozambique’s northern coastline, the French meteorological service said, with wind gusts of up to 260 kilometers (160 miles) per hour.】

item.title: 德国哈贝克对提前淘汰煤炭计划表示怀疑
item.description: 德国经济部长罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）对该国提前淘汰燃煤发电的计划提出了进一步的质疑。【原文：German Economy Minister Robert Habeck raised further doubts over the country’s plans for an early phase-out of coal-fired power generation.】

item.title: 拜登 4000 亿美元绿色银行为特朗普做好准备
item.description: 距离当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职典礼还有不到一个月的时间，能源部正在敲定清洁技术贷款。今天的时事通讯将关注谁将获得贷款，以及特朗普如何重塑能源部。您可以在 Bloomberg.com 上阅读和分享本篇报道的完整版。如需无限制地获取气候和能源新闻，请订阅。【原文：With President-elect Donald Trump’s inauguration less than a month away, the Energy Department is getting clean tech loans finalized.
